alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 10:31AM PST until March 01 at 3:54PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington...Oregon... Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying farm land and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM PST Tuesday was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will drop below flood stage this morning and continue falling through the week. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 400 PM PST.
